---
title: "R CODES FOR DASHBOARD"
---


Start fresh
```{r}
rm(list = ls())
```

Paste links from GitHub here:
```{r}
# paste inside the quotations

gpklink='https://github.com/DACSS690D-SpatialAnalysis/Homeworks/raw/refs/heads/main/MapFromPython1.gpkg'
jsonlink='https://github.com/DACSS690D-SpatialAnalysis/Homeworks/raw/refs/heads/main/MapFromPython2.geojson'
```

Have the maps into R
```{r}
library(sf)

map1=read_sf(gpklink, layer = "usa")
map2=read_sf(jsonlink)
```

See and save plots:

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
map1gg=ggplot() + theme_bw() + geom_sf(data = map1,fill='red', color='grey90')
map1gg

saveRDS(map1gg,file='map1.rds')
```

```{r}
map2gg=ggplot() + theme_void() + geom_sf(data = map2)
map2gg
saveRDS(map2gg,file='map2.rds')
```

You are done!
